attributes.background:
Accumlating evidence is demonstrating the risks of harm from exposure to wireless RF radiation.
A $25 million rodent study identified clear evidence of cancer risk from 2 & 3G frequencies. 
We need to protect our families & demand real evidence of safety before 5G saturation is implemented.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government or Parliament to commission and fund an independent inquiry into the safety of mobile internet signals.
